project.description: Name of the Angular project to run the schematics on.

authorityUrl.description: The authorization server DNS host name or IP address.

clientId.description: The public client application's identifier assigned by the authorization server.

mobileScheme.x-prompt: Custom scheme name ? (optional, only for mobile)
mobileScheme.description: The custom Scheme URI's identifier assigned to the native mobile application.

loginRequired.description: Whether an authentication should be required during the initialization phase.

retrieveUserSession.description: Whether any currently opened user's session should be retrieved during the initialization phase.

loadUserInfo.description: Whether the user's information should be loaded from the userinfo endpoint during the initialization phase.
